text: Arau e'idarae ami manuhaka sihamtara bisaye jana'i dilo yate sihamte jane ye, allahara pratisrauti satya arau niscaya kiyamatata kono sandeha na'i. Yetiya sihamte (nagarabasiye) sihamtara kartabya bisaye nijara majate bitarka karaichila tetiya sihamtara kichumane ka’le, ‘sihamtara oparata saudha nirmana karaa’. Sihamtara pratipalake'i sihamtara bisaye bhala jane. Sihamtara kartabya bisaye yisakalara mata prabala haichila sihamte ka’le, ‘niscaya ami sihamtara oparata machajida nirmana karaima’
